1374: Jois was born in Cromme straet in 1374.
1376: Lost father at the age of 2.
Lost father at the age of 2.
1392: Got married to Folqui at age 19 in 1392.
Jois moved to Die Camp.C.1 after marriage.
1393: Had a daughter with Folqui, Menoldis, at age 19.
1394: Lost mother at the age of 20.
1395: Had a son with Folqui, Menaures, at age 21.
1396: Had a daughter with Folqui, Saxiardis, at age 22.
1397: Lost his wife Folqui while she was giving birth to Kerstiaen in 1397.
Became caretaker of Menoldis, Menaures, Saxiardis, Kerstiaen at age 24.
Got married a second time to Siwa at age 24 in 1397.
Jois moved to Davids hof.A.4 after marriage.
Moved in with wife Siwa after marriage.
1398: Had a daughter with Siwa, Folqui, at age 24.
1399: Lost daughter Folqui when Folqui was 2 years old.
